review:
Dr. Harsh is very gentle in his approach.
His experience shows when he skillfully treats his dental patients. 
I had a cavity and there were stain all over my teeth.
He fixed it all and the medicines he prescribed, helped my swollen gums to become normal in just 3- 4 days.
